verbs.description: [ARG0: The former top advisor to President Trump] [V: went] [ARG1: on ABC News This Week] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARGM-PRP: to talk about the White House ’s controversial move on immigration — enforcing a policy that separates parents from children at the border] — and spoke about growing criticism from religious leaders , including Pope Francis .
